column1: The learned Trial Judge has failed to consider the law and legal principles relating to Common
Intention.  The appellant was charged with murder and for committing the offence of grievous
hurt based on section 32 of the Penal Code based on common intention.  All the witnesses
stated that the 1st accused person was the one who attacked the deceased and the other two
